Apropos de nous Votre Carrière Nos Departements

Rendre l'expérience de soins plus humaine

We want patients to find the perfect doctor and book an
appointment in the most easy way. The patient journey should be
enjoyable, and that's why we are always next to them:
to help them find the best possible care. Anytime, anywhere.

We also help doctors to better manage their practice and build their
online reputation. With our integrated end-to-end solution, doctors
are able not only to improve their online presence, but also to
devote their time to what really matters: their patients.

Pour les Patients

Trouvez le meilleur médecin, réservez une visite et résolvez tout doute lié à la santé.

Pour le Medecins

Gagnez du temps dans la gestion des visites et réduisez de moitié les absences
